00034 #include "btkDirection.h"
00035 
00036 
00037 // Local includes
00038 #include "btkCartesianCoordinates.h"
00039 
00040 
00041 namespace btk
00042 {
00043 
00044 Direction::Direction() : SphericalCoordinates()
00045 {
00046     // ----
00047 }
00048 
00049 Direction::Direction(Real azimuth, Real elevation) : SphericalCoordinates(azimuth, elevation, 1)
00050 {
00051     // ----
00052 }
00053 
00054 Vector Direction::toVector()
00055 {
00056     CartesianCoordinates c = this->toCartesianCoordinates();
00057 
00058     return Vector(c.x(), c.y(), c.z());
00059 }
00060 
00061 void Direction::setNull()
00062 {
00063     m_theta = 0;
00064     m_phi   = 0;
00065     m_rho   = 0;
00066 }
00067 
00068 bool Direction::isNull()
00069 {
00070     return (m_theta == 0) && (m_phi == 0) && (m_rho == 0);
00071 }
00072 
00073 std::ostream &operator<<(std::ostream &os, const Direction& u)
00074 {
00075     return os << "(" << u.m_theta << ", " << u.m_phi << ")";
00076 }
00077 
00078 } // namespace btk
